languages.text: {n}С сожалением прикрыв глаза, Джай отвечает:{/n} "Ладно, не топить же тебя тут, мо{mf|й|я} неромантичн{mf|ый|ая} шерин. Я еще немного понежусь и удалюсь. Эта купальня слишком прекрасна, чтобы я согласилась покинуть ее не под дулом автопистолета".

{n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."
languages.original_text: {n}С сожалением прикрыв глаза, Джай отвечает:{/n} "Ладно, не топить же тебя тут, мо{mf|й|я} неромантичн{mf|ый|ая} шерин. Я еще немного понежусь и удалюсь. Эта купальня слишком прекрасна, чтобы я согласилась покинуть ее не под дулом автопистолета".

traits.locale_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

{n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

{n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

{n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

languages.text: {n}婕伊失望地闭上了眼睛，回答道。{/n}“好吧，亲爱的，既然你这么不解风情，那我就不硬拽你过来了。我在这里再泡一会儿，之后就不再打扰你了。不过，如果你打算让我提前离开这个美妙的浴缸的话，恐怕得拿着自动手枪，指着我的脑袋才行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊失望地闭上了眼睛，回答道。{/n}“好吧，亲爱的，既然你这么不解风情，那我就不硬拽你过来了。我在这里再泡一会儿，之后就不再打扰你了。不过，如果你打算让我提前离开这个美妙的浴缸的话，恐怕得拿着自动手枪，指着我的脑袋才行。”

languages.text: {n}失望して目を閉じると、ジェイはこう答えた。{/n}「いいわ、アタシはアンタに無理強いをしたりはしない。もうしばらくここに浸かって、それから自分の存在を消すよ。でも、それ以上早くこの素晴らしい浴槽から出して欲しければ、アタシの頭にオートピストルを突きつけたほうがいいよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

traits.locale_text: {n}失望して目を閉じると、ジェイはこう答えた。{/n}「いいわ、アタシはアンタに無理強いをしたりはしない。もうしばらくここに浸かって、それから自分の存在を消すよ。でも、それ以上早くこの素晴らしい浴槽から出して欲しければ、アタシの頭にオートピストルを突きつけたほうがいいよ」

languages.text: {n}Cerrando los ojos, Jae responde decepcionada:{/n} «De acuerdo, no le obligaré, mi poco romántic{mf|o|a} shereen. Me quedaré a remojo un rato y luego me marcharé. Pero si quiere que abandone esta sublime bañera antes de eso, tendrá que obligarme a punta de pistola automática».
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cerrando los ojos, Jae responde decepcionada:{/n} «De acuerdo, no le obligaré, mi poco romántic{mf|o|a} shereen. Me quedaré a remojo un rato y luego me marcharé. Pero si quiere que abandone esta sublime bañera antes de eso, tendrá que obligarme a punta de pistola automática».

languages.text: {n}Jae ferme les yeux d'un air déçu et répond :{/n} « Vous n'êtes guère romantique, shereen. Tant pis, je ne vais pas vous forcer à me rejoindre. Je vais barboter encore un peu puis je disparaîtrai. Mais si vous voulez que je sorte de cette magnifique baignoire avant ça, il faudra me coller un pistolet-mitrailleur sur la tempe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ferme les yeux d'un air déçu et répond :{/n} « Vous n'êtes guère romantique, shereen. Tant pis, je ne vais pas vous forcer à me rejoindre. Je vais barboter encore un peu puis je disparaîtrai. Mais si vous voulez que je sorte de cette magnifique baignoire avant ça, il faudra me coller un pistolet-mitrailleur sur la tempe. »

languages.text: {n}Enttäuscht schließt Jae die Augen und antwortet:{/n} "Gut, dann werde ich Euch nicht reinziehen, {mf|mein unromantischer|meine unromantische} Shereen. Ich werde mich noch ein Weilchen erfrischen und mich dann aus dem Staub machen. Aber wenn Ihr verlangt, dass ich mich schon früher von dieser wohltuenden Wanne verabschieden soll, müsst Ihr mir wohl eine Maschinenpistole an den Kopf halten."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

Ich werde mich noch ein Weilchen erfrischen und mich dann aus dem Staub machen. Aber wenn Ihr verlangt, dass ich mich schon früher von dieser wohltuenden Wanne verabschieden soll, müsst Ihr mir wohl eine Maschinenpistole an den Kopf halten."

languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes in disappointment, Jae replies,{/n} "Fine, I won't drag you in, my unromantic shereen. I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

languages.text: {n}Hayal kırıklığıyla gözlerini kapatan Jae yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Peki, tamam, seni zorla çekmeyeceğim benim romantiklik bilmeyen şirinim. Biraz daha burada durayım, ardından müsaadeni isterim. Ama bu harikulade küvetten daha önce çıkmamı istiyor isen, başıma bir ototabanca dayaman gerekecek."

I'll just soak here for another while and then I'll make myself scarce. But if you want me out of this fabulous tub any sooner than that, you'll have to put an autopistol to my head."

Biraz daha burada durayım, ardından müsaadeni isterim. Ama bu harikulade küvetten daha önce çıkmamı istiyor isen, başıma bir ototabanca dayaman gerekecek."
